welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nashville, the vibrant heart of country music! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's lively music scene, southern charm, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all that Nashville has to offer.

restaurants.name: The Band Box at First Horizon Park
restaurants.description: The Band Box at First Horizon Park is a snack place located in Nashville.
restaurants.address: 19 Junior Gilliam Way (4th Avenue North), Nashville, TN 37219

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nashville International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Nashville International Airport serves domestic flights for airlines such as Delta and Southwest.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Nashville International Airport serves domestic flights for airlines such as American and United.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Smyrna Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Smyrna Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
